author: andyc
msg: Fix for deferred DOM breaking when identity constraints was
added. The last patch solved the NullPointerException but
broke the identity constraint support. This patch reactivates
that support and fixes the deferred DOM problem.

author: neilg
msg: fixed a rather serious and insidious bug that caused the deferred DOM implementation to throw nullPointerExceptions in certain cases when dealing with attributes.  This is a partial pullback of andyc's change of R1.107 so has the potential to affect the schema identity constraint implementation.

author: lmartin
msg: Upgraded sample to CR syntax. Identity constraints temporarily commented out

author: elena
msg: Uncommenting code related to DOM Level 2 -- getSystemId()/ getPublicId()
